notfalldatenmodul.name: Koerpermaße
notfalldatenmodul.sql:
SELECT docd as dat, DECODE (typ, 'VVL_WEIGHT1_FD','Gewicht (WNPN)', 'VVL_HEIGHT_FD','Groesse (WNPN)', 'VVL_WWBMI_FD','BMI (WNPN)', typ || ' (WNPN)' ) AS typ, valfx || ' ' || (SELECT LISTAGG(n5800dva.des,'-') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY sortseq) FROM n2330vdc vdc2 JOIN n5800dva ON vdc2.valfx=n5800dva.dva AND dty='VVL_WGHTUNIT' WHERE vdc2.pat = vdc1.pat AND vdc1.typ='VVL_WEIGHT1_FD' AND vdc2.typ='VVL_WEIGHT2UNIT_FL' AND vdc1.vdc = vdc2.vdc-1 AND stat='A') as VALFX -- Query mit vorheriger Zeile / nachfolgender Zeile
FROM n2330vdc vdc1 WHERE pat = :pat AND typ IN ( 'VVL_HEIGHT_FD', 'VVL_WEIGHT1_FD', 'VVL_WWBMI_FD' ) AND docd >= sysdate - :DaysLookBack AND stat='A' AND (SYSDATE <= DATT OR DATT IS NULL)
ORDER BY dat
